meanings.sent1: The pentahedral crystal sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The pentahedral building stood out among the rest.
meanings.sent3: The pentahedral cake was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her pentahedral personality shone through in her artwork.
meanings.sent5: The pentahedral design of the garden made it unique.

meanings.definition: A solid figure with five faces.
meanings.sent1: The pentahedral was carefully crafted by the artist.
meanings.sent2: The children marveled at the pentahedral on display.
meanings.sent3: The pentahedral rolled off the table and startled everyone.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a pentahedral of conflicting thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The pentahedral puzzle was challenging to solve.
